item.title: Soulfarer
item.description: Soulfarer is a mixed reality game that innovates on the way shoulder pain rehabilitation is conducted for manual wheelchair users. Soulfarer improves the traditional process of physical therapy by adding an immersive gaming experience that is engaging, authentic, and useful for both patients and therapists. Explore where therapy meets mystery at Soulfarer.com.
